text:
Hi there I am wondering if anyone can give me any advice using the CRM Object search on custom objects
/crm/v3/objects/{objectType}/search

I am trying to search for a string in a custom object but it only matches on one field "resourcetitle" i want it to also search on "resourcedescription"
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations/v4> is this likely to leave beta in 2021 or not until 2022?
Question: I have a round robin meeting created, I’d like to pull in all available times to book an appointment via the API. Is it possible?
Then I’d like to book an appointment through HubSpot via the API.
No problem I hope it helped :slightly_smiling_face:

<@UD53A9UUR> ooooor I’m not sure whom else from the HS side… maybe <@U2H3TT8F2> <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1630602613073800>

Is there an endpoint we can use to determine the account level/access? Need to only have certain integration features turned on for Enterprise accounts (like Custom Objects), and we want to only optionally display configuration settings for those features. Right now we’re relying on trying to create a custom object and if we get rejected, we call it “enterprise”, whereas if we succeed, we then delete the fake custom object immediately
